channel.title: Venue on FOSS4G Europe 2026
channel.description: Recent content in Venue on FOSS4G Europe 2026

item.title: Accommodation
item.description: Timișoara offers accommodation options for all types of budgets: from low cost hostels to premium hotels. There is also the option of renting private accommodations using services like AirBnB and Booking.

item.title: Getting to Timișoara
item.description:
Transport to Timișoara

By Air

The Timișoara International Airport offers direct flights to multiple European destinations. Other nearby airports with transfer by car include Budapest and Belgrade.

item.title: About Venue
item.description: The FOSS4G Europe 2026 conference is planned to take place in Timișoara, Romania.
